item.title: About me
item.description: Since 2019 I work as a DevOps architect in the domain of automated driving. For this I bring state of the art methods like Continuous Integration, Containerization and an increased responsibility in the development team (DevOps-ish) into the world of embedded automotive systems. Before I worked as a solution architect for connected services in the domain of automated driving. Working with technologies like Docker, GitLab, Azure Cloud, Node.js and implementing Infrastructure as Code, DDD and test driven principles allowed me to keep learning constantly - which is a huge motivation for me.
